creature.$new.name: Thornback Wyrm
creature.$new.visual: A sinuous dragon covered in thorny spines
creature.$new.description: This formidable dragon is covered in sharp, thorny spines that bristle in warning to any who draw near. The Thornback Wyrm is known for its ferocious territorial instincts and its ability to expel scorching breath upon its foes. Its scales glisten with a metallic sheen, and its eyes glint with a cunning intelligence.
